name: Coda Style Sheet File
summary: Learn about .SSS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SSS files are saved to the ~/​Library/​Application Support/​Coda 2/​Styles/​ directory. Downloaded styles can be placed in this directory and then applied through the Colors tab in the Coda Preferences window.

description: Style sheet used by Coda, a Web development application; similar to a .CSS file, but contains markup that defines how the Coda source code editor appears; can specify background colors, text colors, fonts, and other information.
